name: Unbroken Village
description:
Please do not play in fullscreen

Submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021 with theme "Stronger together"

Build your unbroken village and survive as long as you can in this world where factories work better when they are placed next to each other, and buildings can be upgraded to stop the incoming fire and barbarians.

You loose if you're out of cash or manpower

Controls:

wsad - camera movement

mouse righ click- camera rotation

mouse left click - place building

1 - switch to placing homes

2 - switch to placing factories

space - skip to next turn

When you place building on existing one, it upgrades to next level.

Some tips:

  • Remember that factories product more if placed next to same type factories and if next to many resources.
  • Place homes for more man power. The more man power, the more buildings you can place next turn.
  • Place Factories to increase your income.
  • Upgrade your buildings to survive cataclysms.
  • Storms can destroy your tents and can not be stopped
  • Fire can destroy your wooden houses and are stopped by stone houses
  • Barbarians destroy everything and switch direction if they see a fort.
